Articles.Content: Hey, I have been playing the last few weeks, and I am assuming this program is using actual space mechanics equations. Does anyone have a kerbin or mun radius, or mu values for any bodies. I am trying to amass as much data as possible for making more accurate orbits. There are several aerospace engineering students all enjoying this game, and have interest in trying to make use of what we have learned. If anyone knows, the help would be greatly appreciated.

Go to the KSP Wiki. It\'s locked down due to spambots, but the data that you\'re looking for is listed there.

Btw, I\'m an aerospace major too. The game solves the two-body problem to get trajectories.
Ah nice, thank you! That will make things more interesting. Can\'t wait to see this game expand!
